text: Campus Field is a 3,334-seat multi-purpose stadium in Fairfield, Connecticut. It is home to the Sacred Heart University Pioneers football team and the Pioneers Men's soccer team. The facility opened in 1993. The field and track located at Campus Field were modernized and renovated in the summer of 2008. ==See also== * List of NCAA Division I FCS football stadiums ==References== ==External links== *Campus Field - Sacred Heart Pioneers *Sacredheart.edu Category:Sports venues completed in 1993 Category:Sacred Heart Pioneers football Category:Buildings and structures in Fairfield, Connecticut Category:College football venues Category:American football venues in Connecticut Category:Multi-purpose stadiums in the United States Category:Sports venues in Fairfield County, Connecticut Category:1993 establishments in Connecticut Category:Soccer venues in Connecticut Category:Lacrosse venues in Connecticut
title: Campus Field
